name: viewar-documentation
description: Documentation of ViewAR's SDK and API

scripts.postinstall: cd ./website && npm install && cd ../portal && npm install
scripts.clean: rimraf portal/build && rimraf website/build && rimraf build
scripts.git:commit: cd build && git add . && git commit -m 'Deploy new version' && git push
scripts.build:createbuildfolder: cp -R website/build/documentation/* build && cp -R portal/build/portal build/
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:portal && npm run build:website && npm run git:checkout && npm run build:createbuildfolder && npm run git:commit
